name: Heist
install_msg:
Thank you for installing Heist.
Originally made by Redjumpman, updated to v3 by Malarne.
This cog creates a data folder which holds text files for themes.
If you like my cog please star my repo or post any issues on my github here:
https://github.com/Malarne/discord_cogs
